revised_title: Photoelectron Spectra of Halides of Elements in Groups III, IV, V, and VI
tldr: The authors report and interpret the photoelectron spectra of halides of elements in groups III, IV, V, and VI, discussing their molecular orbital structure. They use experimental criteria to identify orbitals and explain how the orbitals of halides of elements in different groups are related. The study provides insights into the orbital structure of various molecules, contributing to the understanding of molecular bonding and electronic properties.
